verses.plain: His foundation is in the holy mountains.
The LORD loveth the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.

tokens.t: loveth the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.

verses.plain: Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.

tokens.t: Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.

verses.plain: I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me: behold Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia; this man was born there.

tokens.t: I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me: behold Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia; this

verses.plain: And of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: and the highest himself shall establish her.

tokens.t: And of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: and the highest himself shall establish her.

verses.plain: The LORD shall count, when he writeth up the people, that this man was born there. Selah.

tokens.t: shall count, when he writeth up the people,

verses.plain: As well the singers as the players on instruments shall be there: all my springs are in thee.

tokens.t: As well the singers as the players on instruments

footnotes.text: for the sons: or, of the sons
